dict.string: . "$TM_SUPPORT_PATH/lib/webpreview.sh" html_header "Markdown Preview" "${TM_FILENAME:-}" if [[ -f "$TM_FILEPATH" ]]; then echo "" fi # make the header above caret into a link that we scroll down to ${TM_RUBY:-ruby} -e ' lines = STDIN.read.split("\n"); n = [ENV["TM_LINE_NUMBER"].to_i, lines.length].min - 1 while n > 0 && !lines[n].match(/^#+/) n = n-1 end if n > 0 && m = lines[n].match(/^(#+\s*)(.*?)(\s*#*)$/) lines[n] = "#{m[1]}#{m[2]}#{m[3]}" end puts lines.join("\n") puts "\n" '|Markdown.pl|SmartyPants.pl html_footer
